description_code: A record of descent or ancestry, particularly of a specific condition or trait, indicating individual family members, their relationships, and their status with respect to the trait or condition.
Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation.
Data obtained through patient examination or treatment.Ê
Genetic data is data pertaining to genetics.
The outcome of a microscopic pathologic examination using various cytochemical and immunocytochemical stains.Ê

The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis. In the case of an endoscopic biopsy, an endoscope is used to obtain the sample.
Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
